title: AI Task Completion Time Horizons
description: Interactive visualization showing how long different AI models can work on tasks before failing, based on METR's research on measuring AI ability to complete long tasks.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: AI Capabilities
Task Completion
AI Benchmarks
METR Research
Model Comparison
learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of ai task completion time horizons
Explore ai task completion time horizons through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of ai task completion time horizons to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on ai task completion time horizons
